sqlMap.select: select b.board_no as no, b.board_title as title, b.board_content as content, b.board_read_count as readCount, b.board_created_date as createdDate, b.user_id as "user.id", u.user_name as "user.name" from sample_boards B, sample_users U where B.board_deleted = 'N' and U.user_id = B.user_id order by B.board_no desc
sqlMap.insert: insert sample_boards (board_no, board_title, board_content, user_id) values (boards_seq.nextval, #title#, #content#, #user.id#)
sqlMap.update: update sample_boards set board_title = #title#, board_content = #content#, board_read_count = #readCount#, board_deleted = #deleted#, board_updated_date = sysdate where board_no = #no#
